title: Input schema for Github issues to Slack actor

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: Enter repositories from which you want to collect the issues. Use the following format: username/repository-name

channel.title: Slack channel
channel.description: Channel where the notification with Github issues information will be sent (e.g. #general)

separateNotification.title: Separate notification per issue
separateNotification.description: Check this option if you want to send separate notification for each modified issue rather than sending 1 notification with all issues merged.

excludeOpenedIssues.title: Exclude opened issues
excludeOpenedIssues.description: Check this option if you don't want to send notifications about newly opened issues. The value is `false` by default.

excludeClosedIssues.title: Exclude closed issues
excludeClosedIssues.description: Check this option if you don't want to send notifications about newly closed issues. The value is `false` by default.
